entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending after midnight then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Sunday 19 March 2023
